triples.name: Generative pre-trained transformer
triples.relevance: DialoGPT applies generative pre-training methodology to transformer models for dialogue response generation.

triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a large-scale generative approach specifically designed for conversational dialogue response generation.

triples.name: Natural language generation
triples.relevance: DialoGPT uses natural language generation techniques to produce contextually appropriate conversational responses.

triples.name: Seq2seq
triples.relevance: The paper employs sequence-to-sequence architectures as a foundation for generating dialogue responses from input context.
